about_text:
UPDATE: WE HAVE AVAILABILITY.

Comfort and elegance in the famed area, Wilshire Corridor. Incredibly central, this building is conveniently located to Century City Westfield Mall, restaurants and theaters near Beverly Hills, UCLA and Westwood Village.

Nestled in a quiet neighborhood in this upscale Westside community, you are close to the 405, UCLA and the heart of Century City and the Beverly Hills office and retail centers. name: 888 Hilgard – Furnished Apartments
about_text: Set within the heart of Westwood, 888 Hilgard offers fully furnished one and two-bedroom residences with flexible stays of 30 days or more.888 Hilgard is central to the areas most sought-after restaurants, shops and vibrant cultural attractions, with Beverly Hills, Bel Air and Brentwood just beyond. And, to boot, you are at the front door of UCLA, Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center and the Wilshire Corridor. At 888 Hilgard, access to all of Los Angeles is both effortless and convenient.

name: Strathmore Regency Apartments
about_text:
Surrounded by beautiful landscaping, Strathmore Regency Apartments is one of Westwood's most unique apartment communities. Located on a peaceful tree lined street, Strathmore Regency has easy access to shopping, movie theaters and fine dining, as well as being a short distance from Westwood Village and UCLA.
Our spacious studio, one and two bedroom floor plans offer our residents many great amenities to include generous closet space, a well equipped kitchen with breakfast bar, wet bar area, hardwood and tile floors, carpeted floors, spectacular views and much more! Kick back and enjoy the serene outdoor atmosphere on your terrace style patio or balcony, or simply relax indoors by your cozy gas fireplace. At Strathmore Regency, we offer residents everything they need for a lifestyle of comfort and convenience.
Strathmore Regency Apartments are filled with trees, flowers and lush greenery, creating a serene and attractive setting. Relax by our refreshing swimming pool and soothing spa or workout in the fitness center. You may also want to enjoy our picnic area with a barbecue. To accommodate our residents’ domestic needs, we provide complete on-site laundry facilities. Don’t forget to visit our photo gallery and see why Strathmore Regency Apartments is the ideal place to call home!

name: 10542 Garwood Pl
about_text:
Enjoy this beautifully remodeled home located in the prime neighborhood of Little Holmby. Perfectly positioned on a secluded cul-de-sac within walking distance to Warner Elementary and near UCLA. Gorgeous traditional styling and details throughout. Rent Special. Ask about Rent Discount!!

Tenant pays all utilities: water, trash, permit street parking, cable/internet, gas, electric, etc. Gardener provided.  No indoor smoking. Pets are negotiable.

name: 520 Kelton
about_text: Welcome to 520 Kelton where quality and comfort meet in the heart of beautiful Westwood. Our prime location is a short walk to UCLA, shopping, and enticing restaurants. 520 Kelton reaches out to students of UCLA to provide style and comfort at an ideal location! There is no need to fight for parking as you will leave your car in our underground gated parking garage and stroll to campus or into the Village in just a few minutes. Our apartment homes boast spacious living areas, extra large rooms, stainless steel appliances, central air conditioning and heating, and balconies. Visit our community today and see why 520 Kelton is the ideal place to call home!

name: Veteran
about_text:
Get the best of both worlds at Veteran Avenue Apartments – convenience and comfort. We are located in sunny Westwood, CA within minutes of UCLA, I-405, and Wilshire Boulevard.

All of our upgraded apartment homes come equipped with plank flooring, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, AC, and gated-access assigned parking. We also welcome your furry friends!

Enjoy your day poolside, relax in the sunshine at neighboring Westwood Park, dine out at a local acclaimed restaurant, or grab a coffee just a short walk around the corner. At Veteran Avenue Apartments, the possibilities start from home!
unique_features: Neighboring Westwood Park & Westwood Dog Park

address: 433 S Midvale Ave Los Angeles, CA 90024
about_text:
433 Midvale is one block from the UCLA Campus! All of our spacious rooms are available to lease individually and include a full suite of contemporary furniture. Walk or bike to class in the morning! Bruin Walk is just a few yards away!

Come home to a fully outfitted apartment featuring a full-size kitchen with a complete appliance package, a bathroom with double sinks*, and units that are pre-wired with Ethernet throughout the building! You and your roommates can enjoy modern upgrades including hardwood-style flooring, central AC and heat, private patios*, and a subterranean parking garage, all available in an environment with a friendly and attentive team!

This is luxury living at its finest, with 24-hour valet staff who offer assistance to our residents as well as on-site maintenance and management staff.
unique_features: Garbage Collection Chutes on Each Floor

name: Westwood Executive House
about_text: Located in the heart of Los Angeles, within minutes from famous cities such as Santa Monica, Brentwood, and Beverly Hills, Westwood Village is a perfect area for students and young adults wanting to meet Hollywood stars, enjoy an active nightlife, sunbathe in Malibu Beach, and enjoy a total “college town” atmosphere. Well located in an urban neighborhood, our apartments are walking distance to supermarkets, coffee shops, restaurants, movie theaters and much more. This makes it the perfect spot for students who need housing close to their university as well as great activities and other necessities for those quick stops in-between or after class.

name: The Argon Wilshire
about_text: The Argon Wilshire is a luxury doorman building on the world renown Wilshire Corridor featuring friendly doormen, Fitness Center, jacuzzi spa, gated guest/resident parking, and state-of-the-art key-fob controlled access. Walking distance to UCLA, Westwood Village, Beverly Hills, and Century City. Excellent school district.

name: Strathmore Veteran
about_text: Welcome to Strathmore Veteran Apartment Homes. This community consist of 3 beautiful apartment buildings and floorplans you can choose from. You'll find this community in the Westwood area of Los Angeles. Westwood lies on the west side of the city and is considered to be one of Los Angeles premier neighborhoods. Bordered by Beverly Hills, Bel Air, Brentwood, and Century City, multimillion dollar homes populate the landscape. Close to Westwood Village is a historic shopping district that features blocks of restaurants and businesses catering to both students and the neighborhoods larger workforce. Strathmore Veteran offers 1 to 2 bedroom apartments. For more details, contact our office at  or use the online contact form and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

name: Levering Apartments Unit 403
about_text:
Luxurious urban living at its finest! 606 Levering offers all the amenities you would expect in the most exclusive building at a fair rental.  Strategically located in Westwood - in a quiet residential neighborhood but close to where things are happening.  This building offers Executive suites and one and two bedroom apartments.
Each distinctive apartment features a FIREPLACE, private BALCONY, custom stained oak kitchen cabinets, safety glass doors, individual air conditioning, high quality carpets plus smoke detector alarms.

Other quality features include ceramic tile over steel tubs and showers with sliding enclosures, vinyl floors in both kitchen and bathrooms, gourmet kitchen that includes dishwasher, gas range, oven and microwave oven for your convenience.

For luxurious living, tenants are provided with locked subterranean parking garage and additional parking for guests, beautiful landscaping, elaborate marble lobby with INTERCOM connecting to each apartment at entrance, two elevators, and SWIMMING POOL on the roof, SUNDECK with panoramic view and a laundry room on each floor.  The building is wired for cable TV.

At Ashton Towers, you'll enjoy a comfortable life of luxury and relaxation. Our residents are offered full access to all our exquisite community amenities. name: Rochester Apartments
about_text:
Westwood Village is just off the I-405 freeway with access to major streets and an abundance of shopping. With so many entertainment options, theaters, galleries and fine dining, Westwood is an ideal spot to attend a movie. At The Rochester you'll find modern and streamlined studio, one- and two-bedroom apartments within walking distance to major museums and cultural centers of Los Angeles. Westwood is a walker’s paradise with local cafes and farmers' markets.

Chic and alluring, The Rochester shines bright with its stunning architecture and outstanding amenities featuring stainless steel appliances, custom cabinetry and countertops, central heat and air, gas fireplaces, private balconies and spectacular views! Our beautifully renovated community spotlights a splendid rooftop sun-deck with a sparkling pool, spa, barbeque area and city-to-ocean view! Just steps from the Wilshire Corridor, the Westwood Village and an abundance of shopping, cultural, and entertainment choices, the Rochester is the luxury rental choice for the discerning urbanites of LA!

R.W. Selby & Co., Inc.

Top Rated on ApartmentRatings!

name: Lindbrook Manor Apartments
about_text:
Welcome home to Lindbrook Manor Apartments, where apartment living goes beyond the basics! “Welcome home” isn’t just something we say; it’s our commitment to you. Lindbrook Manor delivers unparalleled living experiences in LA’s very own Westwood Village. Immerse yourself in a vibrant lifestyle in your very own community, boasting of sophisticated architecture, elegant design, and panoramic views.

Lindbrook Manor Apartments reflects the timeless style and sophisticated luxury of the classic old Hollywood elegance you once dreamed about. Our apartment homes offer the perfect combination of sophistication, tranquility, and convenience in one of LA’s most sought-after locations.

Make the city yours! The best of Westwood Village is within reach when you make your home at Lindbrook Manor. Our beautiful Studio and Townhome floor plans provide you the urban connection you crave, in a charming gated-community setting. From weekly farmers markets, your favorite shopping, exciting shows, top restaurants, and everything UCLA has to offer, you have access to the areas top activities, right outside your door.

Your new home comes with an all-access pass to an expansive list of amenities and services made for you, with you in mind. Providing all of the convenience that comes with apartment living, such as a friendly and professional management and maintenance team, two exquisitely styled and lush courtyards, a resident only 24-hour fitness center, a fully loaded tech-bar in your very own business center, an elegantly designed library lounge, and a convenient 24-hour laundry room. And when you’re not out on the town or working on your mind and body, relax and unwind under the sun; poolside, or lounge under a cabana while the barbecue is grilling your favorite dish!

At Lindbrook Manor, your home is your sanctuary. A better lifestyle is waiting for you, and we can’t wait to welcome you home!
unique_features: Two Exquisitely Styled and Lush Courtyards

name: Legacy at Westwood Apartments
about_text: The Legacy at Westwood is a full service luxurious rental community set on 1.87 acres of premier real estate on Wilshire Boulevard in Westwood, an internationally renowned community in Los Angeles. Legacy at Westwood consists of two 6-story buildings over a common 3-story subterranean style parking structure. We offer a grand entrance interior decorated lobby, central upscale clubhouse, 24-hour fitness center, yoga and boot camp classes. Not to mention a tropical pool with a Jacuzzi that overlooks the prestigious Wilshire Corridor. The Legacy at Westwood is pet-friendly and is Westwood's one-of-a-kind luxury rental community, and it will change the way you think about urban living. It's all here. Just steps away from home, an exciting virtually limitless array of shopping, dining, and entertainment opportunities await. From family eateries to gourmet dining, from unique boutiques to leading department stores, there is something to appeal to every taste and interest.
unique_features: Upgraded Stainless Appliances and Travertine Tile
Washer and Dryer in Each Home
Yoga and Boot Camp Classes Available

name: The Glendon Apartments in Westwood
about_text:
The Glendon, a luxury apartment community, located in the heart of Westwood Village near UCLA, has set a new standard for resort living. Offering spacious one, two and three bedroom floor plans with gourmet kitchens, nine foot ceilings, fireplaces, private terraces, walk-in closets and top of the line appliances, The Glendon is home to those who wish to live in a luxury apartment complex that's convenient to everything.

Resort amenities at The Glendon include an infinity pool, private sun deck and a fitness center offering the finest customized equipment including cardio machines. There's also a weight room and exercise studio. Men's and women's steam rooms, saunas, showers and changing areas are equipped with luxurious fittings and furnishings. 

For studying and relaxing, The Glendon offers beautiful landscaped courtyards with serene tiled Spanish-themed fountains, a computer room and beautifully decorated common areas.  

Best of all, living at The Glendon Apartments offers the ultimate in convenience. The Glendon welcomes pets and it's a short walk to UCLA's beautiful campus, for anytime access to its library, classrooms and medical center. Within one block, you'll find Trader Joe's, Target, Ralphs, Rite Aid and Starbucks as well as numerous restaurants. The Glendon Apartments in Westwood offer exceptional luxury. Please call to set up a tour to check out the finest apartments in Westwood.
unique_features: Contemporary faucets and fixtures in bathrooms
Full size walk in closets for all bedrooms
One, two, and three bedroom floorplans available
Oversized bedroom windows for abundant lighting
Private terraces with soothing courtyard views
Separate stalled showers and tubs for townhomes
Top of the line in unit washers and dryers

name: Village Lofts- Furnished for 6 $825/person
about_text: Village Lofts is Westwood's newest upscale apartment community, located minutes from the UCLA medical center and campus! Our luxury apartment homes provide fully furnished 2 or 3 bedrooms with incredible amenities such as private rooftops/sundecks, study rooms, quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, fitness center with yoga studio, social lounges, and on-site management. In addition, we offer secure building access, garage parking, bike storage, and have a nighttime security patrol. Lease with us to have the best and safest living experience!

name: The Plaza Apartments
about_text:
If you are looking for the perfect new home in Westwood Village, CA, within a short bike ride to the UCLA campus, look no further than The Plaza Apartments. From our location on the edge of the Wilshire Corridor, residents can easily access the I-405, which divides the Westside. The property is within 1 mi. of the UCLA campus so residents have access to a myriad of amenities in Westwood Village, movie theaters, restaurants, shops. All of your basics: Whole Foods, Trader Joe’s, and City Target are within walking distance.  None of this includes all of the trendy eateries and boutiques we love and associate with Brentwood and Beverly Hills. 

We offer spacious one- and two-bedroom apartments with modern and streamlined interiors, fully equipped kitchens, and spectacular views of West Los Angeles. Our residents enjoy use of our state-of-the-art fitness center and rooftop spa. Every floor plan has a balcony or patio for your enjoyment. From our unbeatable location to our endless list of attractive amenities, we are committed to an exceptional standard of living.

R.W. Selby & Co., Inc.

Top Rated on Apartment Ratings!
SatisFacts Insite Survey(R) Award Winner
